sentence.Network_en: "Highly inflammable," it says on the spare canister.

sentence.Network_cn: 隔离带上所有易燃的植被应清除.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from French, or from Latin inflammare (see inflame)

entry.def: An inflammable material or chemical catches fire and burns easily.

auth_sentence.content: They wore gloves and used inflammable material for arson attacks.

inflame[v.使燃烧;激怒]+able表形容词→inflammable可燃烧的,可激怒的

non不+flammable[adj.易燃的]→adj.不易燃的
flam火焰+e→n.火焰,火苗;热情;光辉 v.发火焰,燃烧

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"可以……的,能……的"; 2. 注：如果加在y结尾的单词后通常为去掉y加上icalbe.

conceive构思,以为+able形容词结尾→adj.可想象的
